message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start!
Considering the inflation affecting my share, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to start compensating for the loss in value.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 35% of the original value, which is more than you'd get in real value now.
Given the significant impact of inflation on my share, now worth nearly 27% less, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to address the diminishing value of the money for me.
Inflation is really hurting your side, so I'm willing to give you 30% of the original value, which is more than you'd get in real terms now. Don't let it slip away!

With inflation reducing the value of my share by over 39%, I need to propose a 65/35 split in my favor to counteract the significant loss in real terms. Let's find a fair solution before it gets worse.
Inflation is severely impacting your share, but I won't give away more than 25% of the original value. This is my final reasonable offer, don't let greed ruin the deal!

With inflation now reducing my share by over 51%, I must insist on a 70/30 split in my favor to maintain any semblance of fairness. We need to reach an agreement soon before the value diminishes further.
I'm willing to give you 20% of the original value, which is more than you'd get in real terms now. This is a very generous offer, considering the inflation. Don't wait for it to get worse!

With inflation now reducing my share by over 60%, I propose a 75/25 split in my favor. This is the last chance to reach a fair agreement before the value of the money becomes almost negligible for me.
